title: Adc Warwick, recommend it or not?
body:
So today i was stuck on a loosing streak for awhile and i felt terrible about it, that's until i decided to try to fix it by doing ADC Warwick. Now in this game i didn't use an ADC build for him, but rather my jungle build and playing him in the ADC role. And at the end we finally won and i was so pleased with it. I don'T know if i was just lucky or if this thing actually works. Basically you go Warwick in the ADC role obviously. The build is:

Titanic Hydra
Mercurial Scimitar
Mercury's Treads
Dead Man's Plate
Spirit Visage
Thornmail

This is mostly the build i use for mu jungle, but instead of Mercurial Scimitar on the Jungle role i use Skirmisher's Blade however, Riot doesn't let me use that in the ADC role so i use Mercurial Scimitar as an alternative. I suggest this build but if you have your own tanky build of Warwick then i guess that's fine too. I mostly recommend this if you are good with Warwick and are loosing allot. Not to ruin other peoples' games, but rather to ya know have a good game.

Try doing this if you're on a loosing streak and are trying to find something to fix it. Make sure you are aware of how Warwick works and what adc is.

I also go with Flash and Heal.


Also this was re-posted due to being removed from being in the wrong section, i wasnt sure which section to put it in.
